string-array.name: string_array_content
string-array.item: Our campus has modern facilities including libraries, labs, gyms and cafes. All facilities are open 7 days a week except public holidays.
Join our upcoming orientation day, workshop on study skills, and weekend sports meet. Check the event calendar for details.
There are over 50 student clubs covering sports, arts, culture and academic interests. You can register via the student portal.
We offer academic support, mental health counseling, and career advice. Visit the student services center for more information.
